Caretaker.card_desc: [Warder's Field] Standing in Warder's Field heals you for {scale=20|20} Health per second.

Geomancer.card_desc: [Earthen Guard] Reduce the cooldown of Earthen Guard by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Living Stone.card_desc: [Earthen Guard] Reload {scale=12|12}% faster during Earthen Guard.

Lodestone.card_desc: [Warder's Field] Activating Warder's Field generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Mother's Grace.card_desc: [Earthen Guard] Earthen Guard gains 20% increased Damage Reduction and now grants CC Immunity.

Plateau.card_desc: [Impasse] Increase the duration of Impasse by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Rolling Stones.card_desc: [Armor] Getting an elimination reduces all active cooldowns by {scale=8|8}%

Sacred Ground.card_desc: [Warder's Field] Standing in Warder's Field grants you {scale=5|5}% Damage Reduction.

Shear.card_desc: [Earthen Guard] Activating Earthen Guard generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Standing Stones.card_desc: [Warder's Field] Reduce the Cooldown of Warder's Field by {scale=1|1}s.

Stone Bulwark.card_desc: [Earthen Guard] Heal for {scale=25|25} Health per second during Earthen Guard.

Summit.card_desc: [Impasse] Activating Impasse underneath you applies a {scale=300|300} knockup.

Treacherous Ground.card_desc: [Warder's Field] Warder's Field has a 50% increased radius and now cripples.

Tremors.card_desc: [Impasse] Reduce the Cooldown of Impasse by 70%
